pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Longitudinal Data with Irregular Observation Times // Analysis of longitudinal data for which the times of observation are random variables that are potentially associated with the outcome process. The package includes inverse-intensity weighting methods (Lin H, Scharfstein DO, Rosenheck RA (2004) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2004.b5543.x) and multiple outputation (Pullenayegum EM (2016) doi:10.1002/sim.6829).
